wikipedia_page.main: Karen Newman MRBS (born 20 January 1951) is a British-born sculptor, best known for her bronze bust of Violette Szabo on the Albert Embankment of the River Thames, outside Lambeth Palace in London.

response: In 2008, a bronze bust of Szabo by sculptor Karen Newman was unveiled at the Albert Embankment of the River Thames, in front of Lambeth Palace.
Karen Newman is a professional singer based in Detroit, Michigan and has been the anthem singer of the Detroit Red Wings for more than 30 years.

link_mentions.page: City and Guilds of London Art School
